DecisionRevisit: ^I'm afraid I've run out of dialogue.
BeginQuest: ^Well, a lot! I've heard you want a food corner here.

g-0: ^Exactly right. It would be great to grab something between lectures, and I still don't know the area too well. You know, some inexpensive, tasty, and attractively served food.

MainArgumentNode: ^Why do you want to eat exactly at this location?
^What will other people using this space gain from it?
^Or maybe just leave the greenery as is?
^There has been talk of creating an open-air gallery here.
Question_01: ^Because it's so cozy here! And then it would be a quick hop back to my department.
Question_02: ^It would be a quick hop back for them as well. There are a few other departments nearby. Maybe people would drop in more often.
Question_03: ^It would accommodate only a few cars. And, also, it would be difficult to get in and out. I don't think it's worth it.
Question_04: ^I don't mind the greenery, but there should be more space to lay down on a blanket or set up some deckchairs. The trees can stay, we could plant more things or make flower beds.
Question_05: ^You know, a gallery like that would require maintenance and publicity. Otherwise, it would probably get covered in a thick layer of "dust".
